Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Manchester in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/1/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1984, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/1/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.80 ERA...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1987, going 5-0, 1.11...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/15/1990 to a 4-year deal worth $3,504,600 per year...
Injured on 8/21/1990 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
